org.easybatch.core.filter

Class GrepFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.filter.GrepFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordFilter<StringRecord>, RecordProcessor<StringRecord,StringRecord>

    public class GrepFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordFilter<StringRecord>
    Convenient filter that mimics the unix grep utility: it keeps records containing the given pattern instead of filtering them.

    Should be used with StringRecord type. Search is case sensitive.
